name: Kantbtrue about me
author: Kantbtrue

sections.description:
An elegant sidebar widget plugin to beautify your about me section at the sidebar of your wordpress blog. With this plugin you can add title, description with links, profile image and social links.

It is a about me widget plugin which is also called as profile widget, about widget, author info box, author box, or just simple sidebar about section. What ever you call it, it will make your about section stand out and attract user’s attention.

Get PRO version

Features::
– Fields: Title, Bio, Image, Social Links
– Text Alignment Options: Left, Right, Center
– Image Styles: Round, Square
– Social Support: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Youtube, Bloglovin Personal Website

PRO version features:
– Signature field: You can add your signature in the widget.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Go to WordPress dashboard > Plugins > Installed Plugins
  3. Activate the ‘Kantbtrue About Me’
  4. Now you can add widget ‘Kantbtrue About Me’ into your theme widget area.
sections.faq:
How to add custom CSS?

To add custom CSS, you can use the WordPress default ‘Additional CSS’ section from the customizer.
CSS class naming list:
– container: kbtam
– title: kbtam__title
– image: kbtam__img
– bio: kbtam__desc
– social: kbtam-social
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • ADD: Option to get feedback from user about the plugin
  • FIX: Minor link color issue

1.2

  • FIX: Undefined index errors
  • ADD: Option to open social link in new tab

1.1

  • MOVE: Dashicon to Fontawesome5
  • ADD: Pinterest, Youtube and Bloglovin social support

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: An elegant about me widget and profile widget for blogs. With this plugin you can add title, description with links, profile image and social links.
